REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0484 reute u f BC-BANK-OF-THAILAND-FLOA 03-11 0058

TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF THAILAND FLOATS NEW GOVERNMENT BOND
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of Thailand said it has floated 500 mln baht of new five-year loan bonds for public sale. The bonds will yield 7.25 pct net after tax with interest compounded semi-annually. The aggregate five-year yield will amount to 42.77 pct of the principal on maturity. REUTER
